attributes.action: Review the Selection of the site for the Marine Management Headquarters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Selection of the site for the Marine management Headquarters is a crucial factor in the economic development of Plymouth.  The selection of the winning site may not have followed the’ transparent process’ which is necessary.  We hereby request a review of this decision and an explanation of the reasons which lead to the choice of Tyneside ahead of Plymouth.
